SEO_TITLE: ESLAND Awards 2024 - Celebrating the best of streaming and content creators
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Discover the best content creators from Spain, Latin America and Andorra. Vote for your favorites! Celebrate the innovation and talent of Twitch, YouTube and more

SEO.ARCHIVO_TITLE: Archive of previous editions - ESLAND Awards 2024
SEO.ARCHIVO_DESCRIPTION: Review the best moments of previous editions
SEO.INFO_DESCRIPTION: Discover everything you need to know about the ESLAND Awards 2024 and download the Press Kit
SEO.VOTE_TITLE: Vote for your favorite content creators - ESLAND Awards 2024
SEO.VOTE_DESCRIPTION_en: Vote for your favorite content creators from Spain, Latin America and Andorra

HEADER.LOGO: Back to the ESLAND Awards homepage

HERO_SUBTITLE: Awards to the Spanish-speaking Streaming Community
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_1: The cinema has the Oscars, the music has the Grammys and the streaming has the ESLAND. The awards that celebrate the creativity and talent of the best content creators of the Spanish-speaking community
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_2: Spain, Latin America and Andorra united by creators and their communities, to remember and relive some of the best moments of the year
INTRO_DESCRIPTION_3: After two galas celebrated, one in the Palau de la Música Catalana in Barcelona, and another in the National Auditorium of Mexico City, we just have to wait for the third edition in Andorra
BENTO_TITLE_1: Andorra: the zenith of the ESLAND awards
BENTO_CONTENT_1: A new edition full of news and content, which will start several weeks before the long-awaited gala. Special live shows, collaborations, concerts and much more in what will be an authentic party dedicated to content creation.
BENTO_CONTENT_2: This year, the moment of the blue carpet will be replaced and improved, thanks to the incredible Andorran landscapes, by a white carpet in the middle of the snow, located in the snowy slopes of Andorra.
BENTO_CONTENT_3: An awards gala full of top-notch content and many surprises, in which they will discover the winners of this third edition of the ESLAND Awards.
BENTO_CONTENT_4: This year, the reddit will not be part of the awards voting, but it will be part of the community. The official subreddit of the ESLAND Awards is open for you. Share your clips, opinions and interact with the entire Spanish-speaking streaming community.
VIDEO_ALT: ESLAND - Awards for the Spanish-speaking Streaming Community
PREFOOTER_VIDEO_TITLE: Guide to the 3rd Edition of the ESLAND Awards

FOOTER.DISCLAIMER: © ESLAND 2021 - 2024 All rights reserved. - This is not the official website, developed by @midudev for educational purposes

INFO_TITLE_1: A unique recognition for creators and communities
INFO_CONTENT_1_1: The ESLAND Awards are a private initiative promoted by the renowned streamer TheGrefg, aiming to support and acknowledge content creation in the Spanish-speaking community.
INFO_CONTENT_1_2: ESLAND is an acronym for SPAIN, LATIN AMERICA, AND ANDORRA, three geographical locations that share the language that unites them beyond any border, whether physical or virtual.
INFO_CONTENT_2_1: The trophy presented to the winners at the ceremony is a representation of the letter 'A' divided into three fragments and assembled as a futuristic gadget upon which the event's narrative is built.
INFO_CONTENT_2_2: An artifact of unknown origin that provides tools and skills for creation. A metaphor for the emancipation of talent through technology and the emergence of content creators in the entertainment world.

POLICIES.TITLE: Cookie Policy
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_1: This Cookie Policy is an integral part of the Legal Notice and Privacy Policy of www.premiosesland.com (hereinafter, Website), owned by UBIQ S.L.U (hereinafter, UBIQ) with registered office at Calle Josep Viladomat, 4, Ed Sogas, 1-1 AD700 Escaldes Engordany, and responsible for the Cookies and the processing of personal data obtained through first-party and third-party cookies used on this Website.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_2: This Website uses third-party cookies, specifically Google Analytics analytical cookies, to analyze user activity on the website for statistical purposes.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_3: You can accept all cookies, reject them, or configure your preferences in the cookie settings panel. You can revoke consent or modify your cookie settings preferences at any time by accessing the settings panel again. Additionally, you can prevent the download of cookies or delete those installed through your browser settings, preventing cookies from being stored on your device. It is very important to read this cookie policy.
POLICIES.DESCRIPTION_4: We inform you that rejecting and deactivating cookies may affect or hinder navigation or the provision of services offered on this Website.

WHAT_IS.TITLE: What Are Cookies?
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_1: Cookies are alphanumeric identifiers that contain information installed on the User's device and are downloaded to the User's web browser when they visit and access a website. Their main purpose is to uniquely identify and recognize the User's device each time they access the Website, in addition to improving the quality and offering better use of the Website.
WHAT_IS.DESCRIPTION_2: They are small text files stored on the computer's hard drive that serve to identify the User when they connect to the website again. Their goal is to record the User's visit and save certain information. Their use is common and frequent on the web as it allows pages to function more efficiently and provides greater personalization and analysis of User behavior.

TYPES.TITLE: What Types of Cookies Exist?
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1_TITLE: 1. According to the entity that manages them:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_1: First-party cookies are those installed on the User's terminal from the domain managed by the Website owner, and third-party cookies are those installed on the User's terminal from a domain managed by third parties that process data obtained through such cookies.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2_TITLE: 2. According to the duration they remain active:
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_2: Session cookies are those that remain active and collect data while the user accesses a website and disappear at the end of the session, and permanent cookies are those that remain active and from which information is collected for a period defined by the cookie owner or until they are deactivated or deleted by the User.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_3: These allow the User to navigate through a website and use the different options or services offered, such as controlling traffic and data communication, identifying the session, accessing restricted access parts, making a registration request, using security elements during navigation, etc. Since they are necessary for the website's operation, these cookies will be active and cannot be rejected.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_4: This type of cookie remembers your preferences when navigating the Web so that you do not have to configure the service again each time you visit the Web. Examples in this typology include: Volume settings for video or sound players. Video streaming speeds compatible with your browser. These cookies can be disabled by the User, although this may affect the proper functioning of the Web services.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_5: These allow tracking and analysis of User behavior on the Web to obtain statistical data and improve the Web's operation. Each time a User visits a website, an external provider's tool generates an analytical cookie on the User's computer.
TYPES.DESCRIPTION_6: These cookies allow obtaining information about the duration or frequency of viewing advertising positions, interaction with them, or User navigation patterns and/or behaviors, as they help create an advertising interest profile. Thus, they allow offering advertising related to the User's interests.

BLOCK.TITLE: Reject, Configure, Disable, or Block Cookies:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_1: In the banner or in the always active and accessible cookie settings panel, the User has the option to accept or reject cookies, as well as configure preferences for cookies requiring User consent.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_2: The User can revoke the initially given consent or modify preferences at any time by accessing the settings panel.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_3: Also, the User can block and delete cookies installed on their computer by configuring their browser options.
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_4: Different browsers can be configured to notify the User of the receipt of cookies and, if desired, prevent their installation on the computer. Additionally, the User can check in their browser which cookies are installed and their expiration date, being able to delete them. Information on how to do this for the most common browsers can be found in the links below:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_6: For more information on managing cookies in Internet Explorer:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_7: For more information on managing cookies in Mozilla Firefox:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_8: For more information on managing cookies in Safari:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_9: For more information on managing cookies in Opera:
BLOCK.DESCRIPTION_10: If you want to stop being tracked by Google Analytics, visit:

MORE_INFO.TITLE: To Learn More About Cookies
MORE_INFO.DESCRIPTION_1: You can get more information about behavior-based online advertising and online privacy at the following link:

THIRD_PARTY.TITLE: Third Parties and International Transfers
THIRD_PARTY.DESCRIPTION: You can obtain information about the processing carried out by third parties and possible data transfers to other countries by these third parties identified in this cookie policy in the links provided in this cookie policy. Different mechanisms for regulating international transfers, if they exist, will be informed by these third parties.

UPDATES.TITLE: Updates and Changes to the Cookie Policy
UPDATES.DESCRIPTION: FAN CONTENT may modify this Cookie Policy based on legislative or regulatory requirements, or to adapt the policy to instructions issued by the Spanish Data Protection Agency and the European Data Protection Committee, so Users are advised to visit it periodically.

POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_1: We are pleased that you are visiting the official website of PREMIOS ESLAND www.premiosesland.com (hereinafter, Website), and we appreciate your interest.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_2: UBIQ S.L.U (hereinafter, UBIQ) is committed to complying with current legislation on personal data protection to ensure the privacy, confidentiality, and security of Users' personal data by applying appropriate technical and organizational measures for this purpose.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_3: This Privacy Policy aims to inform Users about the processing that UBIQ carries out on the personal data that the User provides when accessing, browsing, and using the services offered on the Website, as well as the security measures adopted, the exercise of Users' rights, and the contact method.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_4: Personal data will only be obtained by UBIQ for processing when they are adequate, relevant, and not excessive in relation to the scope and purposes determined, explicit, and legitimate for which they were obtained.
POLICY.DESCRIPTION_5: Below, in compliance with current regulations on personal data protection, we provide Users with the following information:

RESPONSIBLE.TITLE: Data Controller
RESPONSIBLE.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ S.L.U (hereinafter, UBIQ), an Andorran company with NRT L-718097-X, with registered office at Calle Josep Viladomat, 4, Ed Sogas, 1-1 AD700 Escaldes Engordany (Andorra), registered with the Companies Registry of the Government of Andorra with number 23023, with email [info@ubiq.ad………….], is the owner of the website www.premiosesland.com (hereinafter, Website).
RESPONSIBLE.DESCRIPTION_2: Users can contact the Data Controller through the following email address: info@ubiq.ad

DEFINITIONS.TITLE: Definitions
DEFINITIONS.DESCRIPTION: For the purposes of this Policy, the following terms will have the meanings indicated below:
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_1: “Personal Data”: any information about an identified or identifiable natural person. An identifiable natural person is one whose identity can be determined, directly or indirectly, by an identifier.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_2: “Data Controller”: Natural or legal person, public authority, service, or other body that, alone or jointly with others, determines the purposes and means of the processing of data.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_3: “Data Processor”: Natural or legal person, public authority, service, or other body that processes personal data on behalf of the data controller.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_4: “Data Subject-User”: Any identified or identifiable natural person whose personal data is subject to processing.
DEFINITIONS.ITEM_5: “Data Processing”: Any operation or set of operations performed on Personal Data or sets of personal data, whether by automated means or not, such as collection, recording, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation, or alteration, retrieval, consultation, use, communication by transmission, dissemination, or any other form of making available, alignment or combination, restriction, erasure, or destruction.

PURPOSE.TITLE: Purpose of Processing
PURPOSE.DESCRIPTION_1: Manage information requests received through the 'Contact' function on the Website. Manage votes for the PREMIOS ESLAND made by Website Users (identification, validation, and vote counting). Statistical purposes for participation and results of votes in the PREMIOS ESLAND -personal data will undergo a anonymization process to fulfill this purpose-. To participate as a jury in the PREMIOS ESLAND, Users must click on 'Identify and Vote' and will be redirected to the Twitch website (www.twitch.tv), where they must have an open account on that streaming platform. When the User, from their account, clicks 'Authorize,' they are expressing that they have read and accepted the Privacy Policy of www.premiosesland.com. Then, the User can select their voting preferences from the different categories defined by Streamers and content, following the instructions on the Website. Once their votes are selected, they must click 'Submit My Votes.' The votes and the User's identity will be recorded in UBIQ's database. The User's identity will be recorded using a hash code -mathematical algorithm- (pseudonymized).
PURPOSE.DESCRIPTION_2: Twitch Interactive, Inc., the owner of www.twitch.tv, acts as a provider of validation and identity verification services for Users who vote to prevent fraud in the voting process.

PERSONAL_DATA.TITLE: Category of Personal Data
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION_1: The category of data processed by UBIQ on the Website includes:
PERSONAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION_2: Email address for the Contact function. Identifying data: User identification using a hash code -mathematical algorithm-. UBIQ does not have access to the data in the accounts that Users have on www.twitch.tv.

LEGITIMACY.TITLE: Legitimacy Basis
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_1: The legitimacy basis for managing communications received through the 'Contact' function is the legitimate interest of UBIQ.
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_2: The legitimacy basis for processing the personal data of Users participating in the PREMIOS ESLAND is the express consent granted when participating as a jury and UBIQ's legitimate interest in managing the events it organizes and in managing the PREMIOS ESLAND.
LEGITIMACY.DESCRIPTION_3: The User may revoke consent at any time. However, processing of personal data carried out before the revocation of consent will be lawful.

PRESERVATION.TITLE: Data Retention
PRESERVATION.DESCRIPTION_1: The data will be retained for the strictly necessary period to fulfill the purpose for which they were collected. However, UBIQ may retain the data for availability to competent authorities or to address possible claims, in which case the data will be kept blocked until the end of the prescription periods, after which they will be deleted with appropriate security measures.
PRESERVATION.DESCRIPTION_2: After the retention period, personal data may undergo a anonymization process for statistical purposes related to the PREMIOS ESLAND.

COMMUNICATION.TITLE: Data Communication
COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ will not transfer the data provided by Users of the Website to third parties, except with the prior and express consent of the Users or when necessary by legal imperative (Public administrations, Security Forces and Bodies, Public Prosecutor's Office, Spanish Data Protection Agency, etc.).
COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION_2: UBIQ informs Users that personal data may be communicated to UBIQ's providers to attend to the management of the PREMIOS ESLAND, in which case they will be treated as data processors following UBIQ's instructions regarding the processing of personal data.

USER_RIGHTS.TITLE: User Rights
USER_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ informs Users that, regarding the processing of their personal data, they can exercise the following rights:
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_1: Right to revoke the consent granted at any time.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_2: Right to obtain information about whether UBIQ processes the User's personal data.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_3: Right of access, rectification, portability, and erasure of their data, and to limit or oppose the processing.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_4: Right not to be subject to automated individual decisions, including profiling.
USER_RIGHTS.ITEM_5: Right to file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (www.aepd.es) when the User believes that UBIQ has violated their rights in the processing of personal data.
USER_RIGHTS.DESCRIPTION_2: Users may exercise their rights at any time and free of charge by sending a written request to UBIQ S.L.U. by postal mail to the address at Calle Ganduxer, No. 129, C.P 08022 Barcelona, or by email to the address [……info@fan.content.com…….]. In both cases, a copy of the National Identity Document or equivalent document proving their identity must be attached.

THIRD_PARTY_DOMAIN_LINKS.TITLE: Third-Party Domain Links
THIRD_PARTY_DOMAIN_LINKS.DESCRIPTION: To participate as a jury, Users will be redirected to the domain www.twitch.tv owned by a third party -Twitch Interactive, Inc. This domain has its own Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy. Therefore, we recommend that Users consult them before use.

SOCIALS.TITLE: Social Networks
SOCIALS.DESCRIPTION_1: This Website may contain links that allow access to different social networks owned and managed by third parties (e.g., Facebook, Instagram, YouTube). These links on the Website are solely intended to facilitate Users' access to social networks to inform them about events organized by UBIQ.
SOCIALS.DESCRIPTION_2: The activation and use of these applications may involve the identification and authentication of the User (login/password) on the corresponding platforms, completely external to the Website and beyond the control of UBIQ. These social networks and platforms have their own privacy policies and cookie treatment. In this regard, any information and personal data that the User provides to these platforms will be under their sole and exclusive responsibility.

COOKIES.TITLE: Cookies
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION_1: This Website does not use cookies to collect information from Users; only proprietary, session cookies with a technical purpose are used - those that allow Users to navigate safely through the Website and use the different functions and services offered on the Website. For more detailed information, refer to the Cookie Policy.
COOKIES.DESCRIPTION_2: However, this Website may contain links to third-party websites with privacy and cookie policies unrelated to UBIQ, and Users can decide whether to accept or reject them when accessing those websites.

INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFERS.TITLE: International Transfers
INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFERS.DESCRIPTION: Personal data may be hosted on servers located outside the European Economic Area (United States, Japan, Australia, Japan). By participating in the PREMIOS ESLAND, you consent to such data transfer and are informed that these transfers guarantee the existence of an Adequacy Decision from the European Data Protection Committee or the adoption of additional safeguard measures to ensure a level of protection adequacy aligned with the General Data Protection Regulation of the European Union.

MODIFICATIONS.TITLE: Privacy Policy Modifications
MODIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: UBIQ reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy based on legislative or regulatory requirements or to adapt it to the instructions issued by the Spanish Data Protection Agency and/or the European Data Protection Committee; therefore, Users are advised to visit it periodically. When significant changes occur in this Policy, they will be published on the Website.

DATA_PROTECTION.TITLE: Personal Data Protection
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_1: UBIQ, as the owner of the website, informs Users that it is responsible for the processing of personal data requested and provided during the use of the website.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_2: In accordance with applicable data protection legislation, UBIQ respects the privacy of Users and the confidentiality and security of personal data, adopting the necessary technical and organizational measures to prevent loss, misuse, alteration, unauthorized access, and theft of the provided data, taking into account the state of technology, the nature of the data, and the risks to which they are exposed.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_3: The personal data of Users of the website will only be obtained for processing when it is appropriate, relevant, and not excessive in relation to the specified, explicit, consented, and/or legitimate purposes for which they have been collected. When personal data is collected through the website, the User will be informed clearly and unequivocally in advance.
DATA_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION_4: Users should visit the Privacy Policy of UBIQ on this same website, where they will find detailed information regarding the protection of personal data.

SITE_UPDATE.TITLE: Website Update
SITE_UPDATE.DESCRIPTION_1: To improve the service for the benefit of Users, UBIQ S.L.U reserves the right to update, modify, or delete the presentation and configuration of the website, its contents, and information contained therein without prior notice, as well as modify the Terms of Use, which will come into effect from the moment of their publication on the website, being applicable from that date.

WEB_INTEROPERABILITY_AND_FUNCTIONALITY.TITLE: Website Interoperability and Functionality
WEB_INTEROPERABILITY_AND_FUNCTIONALITY.DESCRIPTION_1: The website runs on updated 2019 versions of the Safari, Firefox, Internet Explorer, and Chrome platforms. It is especially optimized for Chrome.

INTEGRITY.TITLE: Integrity
INTEGRITY.DESCRIPTION_1: If any of the conditions of use of this Legal Notice are annulled or considered invalid, the remaining conditions will not be affected, continuing in full force and validity.

APPLICABLE_LEGISLATION_AND_JURISDICTION.TITLE: Applicable Legislation and Jurisdiction
APPLICABLE_LEGISLATION_AND_JURISDICTION.DESCRIPTION_1: Any question or controversy that may arise in reference to the application of this Legal Notice between the User and UBIQ is governed by the current Spanish regulations applicable in the matter. And whenever the current regulations provide for the possibility for the parties to submit to a specific jurisdiction, the User expressly waives the jurisdiction that may correspond to them and submits to the resolution of the dispute to the Courts and Tribunals of Barcelona.
